tool_description: The Mega Millions Lottery Data API is a comprehensive and up-to-date resource for accessing historical data related to the Mega Millions lottery in the United States. This API offers a wealth of information, spanning from the year 2010 to the present, allowing users to retrieve data on Mega Millions drawings, winning numbers, and more.
name: Mega Millions
title: Mega Millions

api_list.name: Mega Millions Detail By Code
api_list.description: Details on a Mega Million by using the "code" url parameter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mega-millions3.p.rapidapi.com/lottery/megamillions/V7hiVP2uGGo2zTCuy08b"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mega-millions3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mega-millions3.p.rapidapi.com/lottery/megamillions/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mega-millions3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Mega Millions List
api_list.description: List of Mega Millions dating from 2002 - present
